attributes.action: make all cold weather payments to the old and very young
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are more new born babies than the elderly.
It cost the same to keep the house warm at least the old people can go and get a extra set of clothing when they feel the cold.
But a new born child can not it depends on its parents to do it.
So help everyone in the winter people with children under the age of 5 years and people over 65 years
